name: RollerBaller
description:
RollerBaller is a race against the clock. Stay on the path or suffer the consequences and get sent back to your last checkpoint! A rather infuriating title, this game will make your blood boil and should only be played by the most patient.




Collect coins to unlock new skins, accessories and hats, and have fun blasting through extremely difficult levels. Each level can be beaten in 30-40 seconds, but that will not happen quickly. Your countryball will suffer humiliation as the narrator laughs at your every failure! Play through ten exciting and varied levels; visit ice caps of far north, race through American deserts, and run through a Caribbean island full of explosive barrels!
